thread.title: Ron Bridge
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Ron Bridge

author: Ron Bridge
title: Ron Bridge
text: We had wonderful experience! The tour was exceptionally well-organized - tickets, hotels, transportation. Our guide, Lalit Mishra was a delight. He was very knowledgeable, organized, thoughtful, and empathic. A bonus! As a result of this trip we have expanded our understanding and awareness of this wonderful, complex country.
